cast.overview: When the Bad Guys, a crew of criminal animals, are finally caught after years of heists and being the world’s most-wanted villains, Mr. Wolf brokers a deal to save them all from prison.
cast.title: The Bad Guys

cast.overview: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.
cast.title: The Lego Batman Movie

crew.overview: In this feature film based on the hit animated series, the third graders of South Park sneak into an R-rated film by ultra-vulgar Canadian television personalities Terrance and Phillip, and emerge with expanded vocabularies that leave their parents and teachers scandalized. When outraged Americans try to censor the film, the controversy spirals into a call to wage war on Canada and Terrance and Phillip end up on death row, with the kids their only hope of rescue.
crew.title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut

crew.overview: When the Bad Guys, a crew of criminal animals, are finally caught after years of heists and being the world’s most-wanted villains, Mr. Wolf brokers a deal to save them all from prison.
crew.title: The Bad Guys

crew.overview: A cooler-than-ever Bruce Wayne must deal with the usual suspects as they plan to rule Gotham City, while discovering that he has accidentally adopted a teenage orphan who wishes to become his sidekick.
crew.title: The Lego Batman Movie

details.biography:
John Venzon, ACE, is an American film editor. He is known for his work on The Bad Guys, The Lego Batman Movie, Storks, Flushed Away, and South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut.

Venzon graduated with a BFA in film studies from the University of Colorado Boulder. He is a member of American Cinema Editors (ACE), and the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences.

Description above from the Wikipedia article John Venzon, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: John Venzon
